item.title: 2 injured in shooting on University of Minnesota campus, police say
item.description: The shooting occurred at about 8:20 p.m. outside the 3M Arena at Mariucci following a high school graduation ceremony, police said.

item.title: Trump says he's doubling steel tariffs to 50%
item.description: President Trump announced Friday he'll double steel tariffs from 25% to 50% during a visit at a U.S. Steel mill in the Pittsburgh area.
